description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 4/03/2006

Hector and his brother, Christian (Dr. Ramirez) bond and then head over to Dante’s Beach House for a barbeque Dante and Bridget are throwing which also draws Thorne and Darla. Brooke and Nick start to discuss Brooke’s father Stephen, when Hope interrupts and wants to play “Pirates” with Nick. Nick and Brooke decide to take the kids on an island adventure and depart on the Shady Marlin. Ridge seeks Stephanie’s help to win Brooke back.
